message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $90?
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this deal. I can meet you in the middle at $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $100?
